```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F}
library(RCurl)
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F}
import <- c('importAssessmentOfIncomeTax','importWithholdingIncomeTax','importCorporateTax','importConsumptionTax')
for(iii in 1:length(import)){
script <-
  getURL(paste0(
    'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/',import[iii],'.r'),
    ssl.verifypeer = F)
eval(parse(text = script))
}
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F}
allData <- merge(merge(merge(assessmentOfIncomeTax,consumptionTax,by='Date',all=T),
    corporateTax,by='Date',all=T),withholdingIncomeTax,by='Date',all=T)
write.table(allData, "clipboard-16384", sep = "\t", row.names = F, col.names = T, quote = F)
colnames(allData)
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F}
obj <- c(1,7,16,35,51)
write.table(allData[,obj], "clipboard-16384", sep = "\t", row.names = F, col.names = T, quote = F)
```
